Registrations for WooCommerce

Official Documentation.

Get Started →

Sell registrations

Easy to setup to sell courses, lectures, events or any product based on dates on WooCommerce.

Three type of dates

Single day, multiple days and date range can be set to your product.

Participant data

Asks for each participant name, e-mail and phone.
